name: Mow-Town Riding
description:
Farming was yesterday. Today it's time to mow - in high-speed!

Whether it's a garden, a park or a castle garden: time and skill are everything. Who manages to mow the biggest area in a limited time? To "relax", how about a timed race on the pimped-out lawnmower? But watch out: if you are a reckless driver who wheels over sidewalks or cuts down flowers, your score will drop dramatically.

Features:
- 32 levels
- animated cartoon graphics
- deep tutorial
- online high score via Game Center
- optimized for iPhone
- support for five languages (German, English, French, Italian, Spanish)
